article_title: Affordable Care Act Fails to Address Physician Shortages

article_metadata.author: Walker Ray, MD and Tim Norbeck

og.description: One of the most important and yet unstated premises of the Affordable Care Act (ACA) is that our country will have enough primary care physicians and specialists to care for the 32 million newly insureds. But will we?
og.title: Affordable Care Act Fails to Address Physician Shortages  -  Here's How We Can Better Deal with This Challenge
